description: Breakfast muffins made with yogurt, oatmeal, whole wheat flour, and fruit. Adapted from Banana Yogurt Oatmeal Muffins.
keywords: Banana Strawberry Oatmeal Muffins, blender muffins recipe, Breakfast muffins
name: Banana Strawberry Oatmeal Muffins
recipeIngredient: 1 6 oz container plain non-fat Greek yogurt

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 400°F. Spray a muffin pan with cooking spray or fill with paper liners.
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, brown sugar, baking powder, and baking soda.
In a medium bowl, stir together oats and yogurt until well-combined. Stir in banana, oil, and egg.
Pour wet mixture into the flour mixture. Stir until moistened—do not over-mix! Fold in strawberries.
Divide mixture evenly into muffin cups. Bake for 17–20 minutes or until toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
